judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on the estate.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Groff Estate.
Argued April 28, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Roland Fleer, with him Waters, Fleer, Cooper é Gallagher, for appellant.

October 12, 1971:
